attributes.action: call on the government to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the incompetent bungling of pensions, education, defense, NHS, policing,selling off of the gold reserve,immigration, foreign policy and the handing over of the state to foreign powers(EU)and on the state of our economy over the past 10 years, this government should have the decency to resign or call a general election.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Decision2008/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
